data.title: Resisting colonial state crime: The experience of the Peace Community of San José de Apartadó
meta_keywords: International Institute for the Sociology of Law
data.meta_description: This series collects papers and proceedings related with law and society, and produced at the Onati International Institute for the Sociology of Law, including workshops papers, master tesinas, or research grant productions, in any language.
